name: Bed Material Characterization
functionStatement: Streambed substrate size and composition support aquatic habitat and influence stability and sediment transport.
descriptionMarkdown: Streambed substrate size distribution used to infer habitat quality, sediment transport, and embeddedness/fine sediment stress.
howToMeasureMarkdown: Conduct pebble count or substrate characterization per SQT method; compute percent fines or D50 and apply scoring thresholds (stratified by bed type where needed).

inputs.helpMarkdown: Field substrate surveys (pebble count/sieve) and/or visual bed material characterization.

references: Wolman/USGS pebble count methods where applicable
